attributes.name: type
attributes.description: Sets the type of the input field

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: Name of input value that is received in the _change event

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: Bound to value

attributes.name: placeholder
attributes.description: Text displayed within the input when no value is set

attributes.name: leadingIcon
attributes.description: Icon shown to the left of the text

attributes.name: trailingIcon
attributes.description: Icon shown to the right of the text

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Disable this control. It will not receive focus or events

attributes.name: handleTrailingIconClick
attributes.description: Flag that will result in an icon button component being rendered instead of an icon

attributes.name: focused
attributes.description: Sets the cursor focus to the input

attributes.name: readonly
attributes.description: Makes the input readonly

attributes.name: error
attributes.description: Sets the input to an error state

attributes.name: width
attributes.description: Set the width of the text input area

attributes.name: min
attributes.description: A string value that supports any number, or an ISO 8601 format if using the date or datetime type

attributes.name: max
attributes.description: A string value that supports any number, or an ISO 8601 format if using the date or datetime type

attributes.name: step
attributes.description: How much a number or date should change by

attributes.name: arialabel
attributes.description: Defines how the input will be translated for the screen reader. If not specified it will fall back to the name. If both arialabel and arialabelledby are specified, arialabelledby will be used

attributes.name: arialabelledby
attributes.description: The aria-labelledby attribute identifies the element (or elements) that labels the input it is applied to. Normally it is the id of the label.

attributes.name: autoCapitalize
attributes.description: Controls whether and how text input is automatically capitalized as it is entered/edited by the user.

attributes.name: autoComplete
attributes.description: Controls whether input field should have autofill enabled and what type of information it expects.

attributes.name: _trailingIconClick
attributes.description: onclick function invoked when trailing icon is clicked

attributes.name: leadingContent
attributes.description: Sets the content to the left of the input field

attributes.name: trailingContent
attributes.description: Sets the content to the right of the input field

attributes.name: maxlength
attributes.description: Defines the maximum number of characters (as UTF-16 code units) the user can enter into the input.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the input
